original_text: Immediately, people began to hear the news about Jesus. Everywhere in Galilee, people were talking about him.
korean_text: 예수의 소문이 곧 온 갈릴리 사방에 퍼지더라

sentences.original_text: Immediately, people began to hear the news about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 즉시 예수에 대한 소식을 듣기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: Everywhere in Galilee, people were talking about him
sentences.korean_translation: 갈릴리 모든 곳에서 사람들은 그에 대해 이야기하고 있었습니다
